duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing electronic systems including low level motion controllers, sensor interfaces, and data acquisition for electro-mechanical systems.
Design circuit boards and sub-systems using CAD/CAE tools; planning and conducting tests; interpreting and evaluating experimental data.
Documenting designs, specifications, project status; fabricating breadboards and prototypes; developing test plans and specifications.
Communicating project status and schedule updates; transferring technical documentation into revision control system; identifying critical design factors and risks.
Performing empirical and theoretical analysis; interpreting experimental data; developing test plans and design verification experiments.
